summary: Adds new skills to archery tree: tracer shots, hunter's discipline 2, collect shots.
descriptionHtml:
[color=yellow][b]This mod has been superceded by [url=../61431]Jaxonz Archery Util[/url].[/b][/color]
I do not intend to continue updates.

[center][size=6][color=#F5C908][b]Tools for the Expert Archer[/b][/color][/size]
[size=4]Jaxonz Archery Perks adds 3 new lore-friendly perks to the archery skill tree[/size][/center]

[color=#F5C908][heading]Tracer Shot[/heading][/color]
[list]
[*]Makes your projectiles glow when shot
[*]Better aiming for long shots
[*]Easier to find your arrows
[/list]
[color=#F5C908][heading]Collect Shots[/heading][/color]
[list]
[*]Automatically pick up projectiles within reach
[*]Grab ammo on the fly without event thinking about it
[/list]
[color=#F5C908][heading]Hunter's Discipline, level 2[/heading][/color]
[list]
[*]Makes your projectiles strong
[*]100% of arrows shot are recoverable from enemies
[/list]

[youtube]ne05QMGiUHc[/youtube]

[color=#F5C908][heading]Requirements[/heading][/color]
[list]
[*][url=http://skse.silverlock.org]SKSE 1.6+[/url]
[/list]
[color=#F5C908][heading]Compatibility[/heading][/color]
[list]
[*]Works with bows and crossbows
[*]Fully compatible with DLC and 3rd party mods
[*]Works with 3rd party weapons
[*]"Learns" DLC and 3rd party ammo types (just shoot one into a tree and then inspect it)
[*]No known conflicts with any other mod. Any load order works.
[/list]

Check out [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/10674107/?tb=mods]Other Great Mods[/url] from Jaxonz

All Jaxonz mods are professionally coded for stability and high quality.
author: Jaxonz

files.name: Jaxonz Archery Perks
files.changelogHtml:
Added a bright light to arrows in flight that will allow you to see them even at great distance. (Thanks to JohnnyG118 for the suggestion.)
Simplified the code to more reliably detect the projectile you have shot.
Eliminated the need to register DLC and 3rd party mod projectiles.

files.name: Jaxonz Archery Perks
files.changelogHtml:
Script tweaks to make tracer visuals more reliable.
Script fix to arrow collection which caused multiple collection of the same projectile.

files.name: Jaxonz Archery Perks
files.changelogHtml:
Added code to prevent Collect perk from occasionally collecting a projectile in flight.
Updated Tracer Shots graphics to glow more similar to nirnroot, also adds sonic locator to each arrow you shoot.
Added code to prevent Tracer Shots from occasionally stopping to work.
